caption: Base Feature
description: The base feature is a generic and concrete feature. It also defines a set of attributes available in most feature classes. As a generic feature that does not belong to any feature category, it could be used to log features that are not otherwise defined by the schema.
name: base_feature

name.description: The name as a unique identifier of the feature.

id.description: The id as a unique identifier of the feature.

version.caption: Version
version.description: The version of the feature. For example: 1.0.0-alpha.2.

annotations.caption: Annotations
annotations.description: Additional metadata associated with the feature.

data.caption: Data
data.description: The data associated with the feature.
